title: Implement CoordinatorAgent with Session State Management
description: Implement CoordinatorAgent as orchestrator for seven-stage mission journey. Inherits from BaseAgent with sub-agents, enforces stage transitions, emits coordination telemetry. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md §ADK Agent Coordination, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3

title: Implement Define Stage with Generative Intake & Chip Editing
description: Implement Stage 1 (Define) with freeform intent field, generative chip display, inline editing, brief locking. Integration with IntakeAgent via /api/intake/generate. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 1, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-002

title: Implement Prepare Stage with Toolkit Panel & Readiness Meter
description: Implement Stage 2 (Prepare) with toolkit cards, OAuth connection status, data inspection previews, readiness badge. Integration with InspectorAgent. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 2, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-003

title: Implement CopilotKit Chat Rail with Connect Link Approval Modal
description: Implement persistent CopilotKit chat rail with Connect Link approval modal for InspectorAgent OAuth requests. Approve/decline workflow. Refs: docs/03a_chat_experience.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/10_composio.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-004

title: Implement Plan Stage with Ranked Plays & Undo Plan Preview
description: Implement Stage 3 (Plan) with ranked mission plays, rationale toggle, undo plan callouts, play selection. Integration with PlannerAgent streaming. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 3, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-005

title: Implement Approve Stage with Dedicated Approval Checkpoint
description: Implement Stage 4 (Approve) as dedicated approval checkpoint with play summary, affected records, safeguards, undo plan, approval workflow (self-approve/delegate). Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 4, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-006

title: Implement Execute Stage with Live Checklist & Undo Banner
description: Implement Stage 5 (Execute) with live checklist, alert rail for validator notifications, evidence artifact streaming, undo banner with countdown. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 5, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-007

title: Implement Reflect Stage with Outcomes & Feedback Drawer
description: Implement Stage 6 (Reflect) with outcome snapshot, evidence gallery, follow-up checklist with bd integration, feedback drawer for ratings and notes. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 6, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-008

title: Implement /api/intake/generate for Brief Generation
description: POST endpoint to receive mission intent, invoke IntakeAgent, return generated chips with confidence scores. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-001

title: Implement /api/toolkits/recommend for Inspector Discovery
description: POST endpoint for InspectorAgent no-auth discovery phase. Returns recommended toolkits, anticipated scopes, coverage estimate. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-002

title: Implement /api/toolkits/authorize for OAuth Initiation
description: POST endpoint for InspectorAgent OAuth initiation after approval. Generates Connect Link, awaits connection, logs granted scopes. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/10_composio.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-003

title: Implement IntakeAgent for Generative Brief Creation
description: Implement IntakeAgent for Stage 1 (Define) to parse mission intent and generate editable chips with confidence scoring. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 1, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-002

title: Implement /api/plans/rank for Planner Streaming
description: GET endpoint with SSE support for PlannerAgent to stream ranked mission plays. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-004

title: Implement /api/approvals for Approval Workflow
description: POST/PATCH/GET endpoints for Stage 4 approval workflow with role-based gating and audit trails. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-005
notes: Implement Stage 4 approvals API routes, telemetry, and tests

title: Implement /api/execution/run for Executor Orchestration
description: POST endpoint with SSE support for ExecutorAgent to run approved play actions with streaming progress updates. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-006

title: Implement /api/feedback/* for Reflect Stage
description: POST endpoints for feedback submission including ratings, effort saved, qualitative notes, library contribution suggestions. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §4, docs/backlog.md TASK-API-007

title: Implement Telemetry Audit Script
description: Implement scripts/audit_telemetry_events.py to validate event catalog completeness, verify context fields, generate coverage reports. Refs: docs/06_data_intelligence.md §7.1, docs/backlog.md TASK-DATA-001
notes: Added scripts/audit_telemetry_events.ts with check/report modes, generated docs/readiness/telemetry_coverage.md, wired pnpm run audit:telemetry, and added Vitest coverage for parser logic.

title: Implement Library Embeddings with pgvector
description: Implement library embedding generation using pgvector for semantic search of mission plays. Weekly cron job refresh. Refs: supabase/migrations/0001_init.sql, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §6, docs/backlog.md TASK-DATA-002

title: Implement Analytics Dashboard Materialized View Refresh
description: Implement nightly materialized view refresh automation for analytics dashboards (Executive, Governance, Operations, Adoption, Agent Performance). Refs: supabase/migrations/0001_init.sql, docs/06_data_intelligence.md §7.3, docs/backlog.md TASK-DATA-003

title: Implement Executive Dashboard Frontend
description: Implement Executive Dashboard frontend consuming executive_summary view with weekly metrics, conversion funnel, automation coverage. Refs: docs/06_data_intelligence.md §4.1, docs/backlog.md TASK-DATA-004

title: Implement Governance Dashboard Frontend
description: Implement Governance Dashboard frontend consuming governance_insights view with safeguard adherence, undo efficacy, validator override rates. Refs: docs/06_data_intelligence.md §4.2, docs/backlog.md TASK-DATA-005

title: Implement ADK Evaluation Suites
description: Implement ADK evaluation suites for agent smoke tests, mission journeys, ranking quality, coordination, recovery scenarios. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/09_release_readiness.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-TEST-001

title: Implement InspectorAgent for No-Auth Discovery & OAuth Initiation
description: Implement InspectorAgent for Stage 2 (Prepare) with two-phase workflow: (1) No-auth discovery via Composio SDK, (2) OAuth initiation via Connect Links after approval. Refs: docs/10_composio.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §5.2, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-003

title: Implement Frontend Accessibility Testing
description: Implement automated accessibility testing for all UI components using axe-core. CI gate for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §8, docs/backlog.md TASK-TEST-002

title: Implement End-to-End Integration Tests
description: Implement end-to-end integration tests for complete mission journeys (Home → Reflect) using Playwright with real ADK agents. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §8, docs/09_release_readiness.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-TEST-003

title: Implement Agent Deployment Automation
description: Implement scripts/deploy-agent.sh for FastAPI agent deployment to Fly.io/GKE with health checks, rollback procedures, environment validation. Refs: docs/04_implementation_guide.md §9, docs/07_operations_playbook.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-OPS-001

title: Implement Monitoring Dashboards (Datadog Integration)
description: Implement Datadog integration for Control Plane monitoring with dashboards for Operations, Agent Performance, Infrastructure health. Alert rules and auto-issue creation. Refs: docs/06_data_intelligence.md §4.3, docs/07_operations_playbook.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-OPS-002

title: Implement Incident Response Automation
description: Implement automated incident response workflow with bd issue creation, runbook routing, escalation paths for SEV-1/SEV-2 alerts. Refs: docs/07_operations_playbook.md, docs/09_release_readiness.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-OPS-003

title: Implement Evidence Bundle Export Automation
description: Implement scripts/export_evidence_bundle.py to package mission metadata, telemetry slice, validator notes, artifacts for governance reviewers. Refs: docs/06_data_intelligence.md §7.4, docs/09_release_readiness.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-DOC-001

title: Implement Quarterly Documentation Review Checklist
description: Create quarterly documentation review checklist and automation to flag stale docs, missing evidence artifacts, broken cross-references. Refs: docs/00_README.md, docs/09_release_readiness.md, docs/backlog.md TASK-DOC-002

title: Implement PlannerAgent with Library Retrieval & Ranking
description: Implement PlannerAgent for Stage 3 (Plan) to assemble ranked mission plays with library retrieval via pgvector similarity search. Hybrid ranking with validator critique. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-004

title: Implement ValidatorAgent for Safeguard Enforcement
description: Implement ValidatorAgent for preflight/postflight safeguard checks across Prepare, Plan, Execute stages. Scope validation, auto-fix attempts, escalation. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-005

title: Implement ExecutorAgent for Governed Tool Execution
description: Implement ExecutorAgent for Stage 5 (Execute) to run governed tool calls via Composio SDK provider adapters. Coordinates with Validator and Evidence agents. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-006

title: Implement EvidenceAgent for Artifact Packaging & Library Curation
description: Implement EvidenceAgent for Stages 5-6 to package mission artifacts, generate SHA-256 hashes, create undo hints from Composio audit logs, suggest library contributions. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §3, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-007

title: Implement SupabaseSessionService for Production State Persistence
description: Implement custom SupabaseSessionService to replace ADK InMemorySessionService in production. Persists ctx.session.state to mission_sessions with optimistic locking. Refs: docs/02_system_overview.md §Session State Persistence, docs/backlog.md TASK-ADK-008

title: Implement Home Dashboard with Multi-Mission Overview
description: Implement Stage 0 (Home) dashboard showing active missions, pending approvals, recent outcomes, mission library with readiness badges. Refs: docs/03_user_experience.md §Stage 0, docs/04_implementation_guide.md §2, docs/backlog.md TASK-UI-001
